Name: Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy
About the game: AN ADAPTATION OF A CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED BOARD GAME Background Alliances are shattering, and hasty diplomatic treaties are made in secrecy. A confrontation of the superpowers seems inevitable – only the outcome of the galactic conflict remains to be seen. Which faction will emerge victorious and rule the galaxy? Gameplay Eclipse places you in control of a vast interstellar civilization, competing for success with its rivals. But instead of overcomplex set of rules and overall epicness, it offers more accessible choices, more elegant mechanics and much faster gameplay. And it does all of that without reducing the strategic depth of the game - just like every euro-style board game should. Eclipse other civilizations and lead your people to victory! Features Official digital version of the ‘Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy’ boardgame Deep and challenging 4X (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, and eXterminate) gameplay 7 species with different strengths and weaknesses Customizable star systems, technology tree and ship designs Up to 6 players (human or AI) Asynchronous, cross-platform multiplayer 3 AI difficulty levels In-game tutorial & manual
